nodes.text: Commander-in-Chief was the title held by a person who exercised supreme control over a military force, typically a head of state. During the Clone Wars, Supreme Chancellor Sheev Palpatine was the commander-in-chief of the Grand Army of the Republic. The Kaleesh cyborg Grievous served as Commander-in-Chief of the Separatist Droid Armies during the Clone Wars. In the Alliance to Restore the Republic, it was Chief of State Mon Mothma who held that title.
